name: Home Game 2
summary:
Home Game 2 is about the hermit selling his home.
Explore town, hop fences to enter yards, acquire cursed swords, ruin your mood by mis-using magic spells, die over and over and over again. Never find your way.
This hectic masocore features scrolls, portals, demons and death.
Drink coffee across 8 levels and try to survive your stalker.
Achieve a perfect homesense score.
Can you reach the truest ending?
